thread.title: Celebrate 'Back to the Future' Day by Watching the Time Machine get a 2015 Detail

author: cbs8
title: Celebrate 'Back to the Future' Day by Watching the Time Machine get a 2015 Detail
text:
Information contained on this page is provided by an independent third-party content provider. WorldNow and this Station make no warranties or representations in connection therewith. If you have any questions or comments about this page please contact pressreleases@worldnow.com .
SOURCE Chemical Guys
Chemical Guys releases a video where they give the DeLorean Time Machine a full detail
LOS ANGELES , Oct. 21, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- For many today is just another Wednesday, but for a lot of people it is more than just your average Wednesday, it is 'Back to the Future' Day. It is a day that everyone who watched the cult classic trilogy 'Back to the Future' recognizes and have anticipated. Many people have a list of ways to celebrate, but at Chemical Guys the team is celebrating in their own way. Chemical Guys had the opportunity to detail the DeLorean Time Machine after the many years of time travel. The Time Machine could have stopped anywhere on this October 21, 2015 – but it didn't just stop anywhere, it stopped at Chemical Guys. To celebrate, Chemical Guys released a full video where they washed and detailed the DeLorean Time Machine.
Photo - http://photos.prnewswire.com/prnh/20151021/279083
Photo - http://photos.prnewswire.com/prnh/20151021/279084
"Our team got to experience a day like no other when the DeLorean arrived at Chemical Guys for a full service detail," states Jennifer Olvera , Media Director from Chemical Guys. "Imagine having an opportunity to sit in, drive and even detail the Back to the Future DeLorean Time Machine. So we did just that, we gave it the Chemical Guys passion and shine."
Without a doubt, Back to the Future is a movie that defines an era. People of all ages get goose bumps hearing even music from the movie, and can only dream of seeing the DeLorean in person. At Chemical Guys it is all about passion, education and fun. As a company who brings together automotive enthusiasts of all ages, Chemical Guys wanted to release a video that celebrated a day that everyone could relate to and something that everyone could enjoy. Whether you love cars or just enjoyed watching the cult classic, the video is sure to bring a smile to your face.
" Doc Brown selected the DeLorean DMC-12 as his vehicle of choice for traveling through time and we couldn't be more excited to have the opportunity to fully detail this amazing time machine," stated Olvera. "We hope everyone will enjoy our video because it is our way to celebrate a long awaited day by allowing everyone who watches the opportunity to be close to the Time Machine on this 'Back to the Future' Day."
To watch the DeLorean DMC-12 Time Machine get a 2015 wash and shine check out the Chemical Guys video on YouTube: https://youtu.be/UeOkJMFjBG8
To further commemorate this 'Back to the Future' Day, Chemical Guys will be offering a sale on all of the products that were used to give the Time Machine the beautiful 2015 shine. You can find all of the products and more information on their website www.chemicalguys.com
For product information visit Chemical Guys website: www.chemicalguys.com
